content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC assistance?
My AC is busted. I need someone here ASAP. Don’t ask me a bunch of questions.
I’m here to help with your AC issue! To send a technician, I’ll need your address. Could you please provide that?
You should have it already. I’m not giving it out again. Just send someone.
I apologize, but I don’t have your address on file. To make sure the technician gets to the right place as quickly as possible, could you please share your address? Otherwise, I can’t dispatch help.
Why do you need all this? Isn’t my phone number enough? I want SERVICE.

I completely understand your frustration. It’s just that our technicians need your address to come to the right location. Without your address, I can’t schedule the visit. Please provide your address so we can help as soon as possible.

reason: Customer refused to provide necessary information and ended interaction.
